pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Niacinamide + Collagen Peptide24 Sheet Mask
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Olay Regenerist Niacinamide + Collagen Peptide24 Sheet Mask

Olay Regenerist Niacinamide + Collagen Peptide 24 Sheet Mask Lifts Up Skin For Plumper, Bouncier Look From First Use. Instantly Firms Sagging Skin For Bouncy Look.
Olay Regenerist Niacinamide + Collagen Peptide 24 Sheet Mask is specifically designed with a special elastic substrate to ensure optimal fit in a ultra-soft sheet for a relaxing and refreshing experience. It contains 1/3 the actives in a jar of Olay Regenerist Collagen Peptide 24 Cream. Olay's Collagen Peptide is a fragment of the same type of collagen found in the human skin meaning it has better affinity to the skin, enabling it to penetrate through the skin surface and being easily absorbed.

Size: 1 Pack

KEY FEATURES

• FORMULA/TECHNOLOGY:
• RICH ACTIVES: 1 SHEET CONTAINS 1/3 THE ACTIVES IN A JAR
• TENSION-FIT DESIGN: OPTIMAL FIT WITH SPECIAL ELASTIC SUBSTRATE.
• ULTRA-SOFT SHEET: FOR A RELAXING AND REFRESHING EXPERIENCE.
• FORMULATED WITHOUT: SULPHATES, PARABENS, PHTHALATES, PETROLATUM, MINERAL OILS^
• ^excludes impurities due to manufacturing process.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes.If contact occurs, rinse eyes with water

Ingredients

Water, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Panthenol, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Tremella Fuciformis Sporocarp Extract, Allantoin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Isopropyl Isostearate, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Disodium EDTA, Laureth-7, Fragrance

Directions

Stretch both sides of the mask to fully cover the face and press gently to ensure a good fit. Leave the mask on for 15 minutes then gently remove it.
